item.title: CES 2025: LG unveils new Gram series AI PCs - Deccan Herald
item.description:
LG Unveils New Gram Series AI PCs at CES 2025

Published: 01 January 2025, 12:28 IST - Source: Deccan Herald

LG has announced its new Gram series AI PCs, set to debut at CES 2025 in Las Vegas next week. The series includes four variants: Gram Book, Gram Pro, Gram Pro 17-inch, and Gram Pro 2-in-1.

  • The Gram Book features a 15.6-inch full HD display, Intel Core i5 processor, and up to 1TB SSD storage.
  • The Gram Pro sports a 16-inch WQXGA LCD display with peak brightness of 400nits, Intel Core Ultra processors, and up to 2TB Gen4 NVMe storage.
  • The Gram Pro 17-inch model features the same display and connectivity ports as the smaller model, with four 3.0W stereo speakers and Intel Core Ultra processors.
  • The Gram Pro 2-in-1 is available in two 16-inch screen variants, with Intel Core Ultra processors and up to 2TB Gen4 NVMe storage.

The new laptops will be showcased at CES 2025 and will hit global markets, including India, later in the year.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 series: One UI 7 may feature Gemini Live on lock screen - Business Standard
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy S25 series: One UI 7 may feature Gemini Live on lock screen

Published on: Jan 01 2025 | Source: Business Standard

Samsung is reportedly planning a deeper integration of Google Gemini AI on its Galaxy smartphones with the new Android 15-based One UI 7 user interface. The new interface will utilize a feature called the Now Bar on the lock screen.

  • The Now Bar will work like a lock screen widget with quick access to personalized actions and frequently used apps.
  • Gemini Live will offer a human-like conversational experience with the AI assistant, featuring phone-call-style controls on the lock screen.
  • New Gemini Extensions for native Galaxy apps will allow the AI assistant to perform functions within apps like Samsung Calendar and Samsung Notes.
  • Users may have the option to switch from the native Bixby assistant to Google Gemini.
  • Samsung might provide additional Gemini Advanced subscriptions with purchases of Galaxy S25 series smartphones.
“The base Galaxy S25 could get three months of Gemini Advanced subscription for no additional cost.”

This integration aims to enhance user experience by providing more functionality and ease of use via AI-powered tools on Samsung devices.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 to feature ProMotion display, high refresh rate for all models - CNBCTV18
item.description:
Apple iPhone 17 to feature ProMotion display, high refresh rate for all models

Publication Date: TBD | Source: CNBC TV18

Apple is rumored to expand its ProMotion display technology to all models of the upcoming iPhone 17, moving away from the traditional 120Hz refresh rate exclusive to Pro models.

  • All iPhone 17 models may feature the high-refresh-rate ProMotion display.
  • LTPO panels could replace LTPS panels used in previous models, allowing for smoother visuals.
  • Rumors suggest an anti-reflective display that may be more scratch-resistant than current models.
  • The expected launch is set for September 2025.
“The LTPO panels would not only support a high refresh rate but also offer always-on display capabilities.”

While the enhancements are exciting, confirmation from Apple is pending as the launch date approaches.

item.title: Next OnePlus Watch to get ECG and more health features: What to expect - Business Standard
item.description:
Upcoming OnePlus Watch: ECG, Temperature Sensor, and More Health Features Inbound

Publication Date & Source: Android Authority

OnePlus is reportedly working on advanced health features for the third-generation OnePlus Watch, according to a recent report by Android Authority. The upcoming smartwatch is expected to introduce Electrocardiogram (ECG), skin temperature measurement, and other features.

  1. ECG and Atrial Fibrillation Detection
  2. Wrist Temperature Measurement
  3. 60-Second Check-up Feature
  4. Potential 'OnePlus Watch 3 Pro' Model
  5. Expected Specs: Qualcomm Snapdragon W5, 2GB RAM, 32GB Storage
According to the report, the new OnePlus OHealth app now mentions 'OnePlus Watch 3' and 'OnePlus Watch 3 Pro' among the list of supported devices.

The company may launch the next-generation smartwatch around the same time as the OnePlus Watch 2, which was released in March 2024.

item.title: Flipkart kicks off 2025 with ‘Big Bachat Days’ sale: Discounts on iPhone 16 series, Pixel 9, Galaxy Z Fold 6 and more | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Flipkart kicks off 2025 with ‘Big Bachat Days’ sale: Discounts on iPhone 16 series, Pixel 9, Galaxy Z Fold 6 and more

Date: January 1, 2025 | Source: Live Mint

Walmart-owned Flipkart has kicked off its 'Big Bachat Days' sale, providing enticing discounts on a variety of smartphones from January 1 to January 5, 2025.

  • Discounts of up to ₹7,000 on Apple’s iPhone 16 series.
  • Google’s Pixel 9 series discounted by up to ₹10,000.
  • Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 discounted by ₹12,500.
  • EMI plans of up to 24 months offered for HDFC Bank cardholders.
  • Sale includes offers on various brands like Motorola, Xiaomi, and Vivo.
“The iPhone 16 Pro Max (256GB) is available for ₹137,900, down from ₹144,900.”

In conclusion, Flipkart's 'Big Bachat Days' sale offers significant savings for smartphone buyers looking to upgrade their devices in early 2025.

item.title: This smallcap retail stock has quadrupled this year. Can it keep rising in 2025? | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
This Smallcap Retail Stock Quadrupled in 2023: Will It Continue to Rise in 2025?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Stock Market News

India's retail sector is experiencing significant growth, marked by a projected 50% increase in retail space by 2028 and an industry valuation of over $1 trillion in 2023.

  • Demand for organized retail spaces and value-driven chains is driving the transformation.
  • The retail sector is expected to grow at a CAGR of 10% by 2030.
  • Investors are keenly watching smallcap stocks as they have shown substantial year-to-date returns.
"The industry was valued at over $1 trillion in 2023 and is set to grow at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 10% by 2030."

In conclusion, the smallcap retail stock market shows promise for continued growth, largely due to the robust expansion of the retail sector in India.

item.title: Poco X7 5G series launch date confirmed: Key features and specifications revealed - India TV News
item.description:
Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Key Features and Specifications Revealed

Publication Date: January 2025 Source: India TV News

The Poco X7 5G series is all set to launch in India on January 9, featuring the Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G models. The devices will be available on Flipkart, showcasing exciting design elements and robust specifications.

  • The Poco X7 5G includes a centrally located squircle-shaped rear camera and may be available in silver and green.
  • The Poco X7 Pro features a pill-shaped camera module and could sport a dual-tone black and green finish.
  • Performance is powered by MediaTek processors: Dimensity 8400-Ultra for the Pro and Dimensity 7300-Ultra for the standard model.
  • The Pro model is expected to have a 50MP primary camera, while the standard version may include a 20MP front camera for selfies.
  • Both phones are expected to have IP68 water and dust resistance ratings.
  • Display specifications include a 6.67-inch AMOLED with 120Hz refresh rate for both models, and battery capacities of 5,110mAh for the X7 and 6,000mAh for the Pro.
"The Poco X7 5G series is expected to make a big splash in the Indian market upon its release."

With a combination of compelling specifications and attractive design, the Poco X7 5G series aims to attract a significant audience upon its launch.

item.title: Poco X7 Pro to undercut Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus pricing, Poco confirms ahead of January 9 launch - The Financial Express
item.description:
Poco X7 Pro to Undercut Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus Pricing Ahead of Launch

Date: January 9, 2024 Source: Financial Express

The upcoming Poco X7 Pro is set to be priced under Rs 30,000, making it cheaper than the Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus. With advanced features and a powerful processor, it aims to capture the high-performance budget segment.

  • Poco X7 Pro to be priced under Rs 30,000.
  • This pricing is consistent with the previous Poco X6 Pro.
  • Powered by MediaTek Dimensity 8400 processor with a 6,550 mAh battery.
  • Will compete with Redmi Note 14 Pro Plus, which starts above Rs 30,000.
Poco claims that the choice of chipset makes the X7 Pro the most powerful phone under the Rs 30K segment.

The X7 Pro showcases Poco's strategy of delivering high-performance devices at competitive prices.

item.title: Apple may be considering high refresh rate screens for all iPhone 17 series models - The Indian Express
item.description:
Apple May Introduce High Refresh Rate Displays in All iPhone 17 Models

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Apple, known for its premium smartphones, may change its strategy regarding display technology. Recent leaks suggest that high-refresh-rate displays could be available in all iPhone 17 models, a shift from the previous exclusivity to Pro variants.

  • High-refresh-rate “ProMotion” displays may be introduced in the iPhone 17 series.
  • Possible use of LTPO panels across all models, enhancing display capabilities compared to LTPS panels currently used.
  • Support for always-on display features will be available.
  • The entire series may feature a new anti-reflective, scratch-resistant display.
  • Introduction of a new model rumored to replace the iPhone 17 Plus, possibly named “Slim” or “Air”.
“The non-Pro models in the iPhone 15 and iPhone 16 series use LTPS panels, which have a maximum refresh rate of just 60Hz.”

This update could significantly enhance user experience across the iPhone 17 lineup, as consumers may benefit from improved display technologies previously limited to higher-end models.

item.title: Following listing, beer maker Kati Patang plans to acquire and incubate small alcohol businesses to expand | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Kati Patang Expands with Plans to Acquire Small Alcohol Businesses

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Mint

Kati Patang Lifestyle, a craft beer maker, aims to expand its operations by acquiring and incubating small alcohol businesses as it recently went public through a share swap.

  • The company will grow both organically and inorganically over the next two years.
  • Its recent acquisition includes a stake in a UK brewery.
  • Kati Patang seeks to foster expansion while developing its own brands.
“We are looking to acquire and incubate domestic and international brands,” said co-founder Shantanu Upadhyay.

Kati Patang's strategy indicates a focused approach on scaling operations in the competitive alcohol market.

item.title: Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat - India.com
item.description:
Anant Ambani's fitness trainer, Vinod Channa, shares 3 ways to reduce belly fat

Published Date: N/A Source: India.com

Vinod Channa, the fitness trainer who assisted Anant Ambani in his notable weight loss journey, provides three key strategies to effectively reduce belly fat.

How to Reduce Belly Fat in 3 Steps?

  1. Eat at regular intervals: Channa emphasizes the importance of regular eating to keep metabolism active without stressing the intestinal system.
  2. Work on abs at the right time: The optimal time for abs workouts is after larger muscle exercises to maximize calorie burn.
  3. Work on all muscle groups: Target all major abdominal muscles for comprehensive results.

Channa also stresses that each individual's weight loss journey is unique and tailored nutrition plans are essential.

About Vinod Channa

Vinod Channa is a highly sought-after celebrity fitness trainer known for his holistic approach to fitness and nutrition.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 to launch in 2025 with major upgrades, never seen before! - India TV News
item.description:
Apple iPhone 17 to launch in 2025 with major upgrades, never seen before!

Publication Date: January 1, 2025

Source: India TV News

Apple is gearing up to launch its iPhone 17 series in 2025, promising major upgrades that fans have long anticipated.

  • All models will feature Pro Motion OLED displays with a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • The iPhone 17 series is rumored to include a 48MP rear camera with advanced AI features.
  • It will be powered by the A19 Bionic chipset with an impressive 12GB of RAM.
  • Potential introduction of the thinnest iPhone dubbed the 'iPhone 17 Air' or 'iPhone 17 Slim'.
“With upgrades in display, camera, and hardware, the iPhone 17 series is poised to set new benchmarks in smartphone technology.”

This upcoming series could redefine the smartphone experience with its innovative features and design.

item.title: Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Check Out Specifications - ABP Live
item.description:
Poco X7 5G Series Launch Date Confirmed: Check Out Specifications

Publication Date: January 2, 2025 Source: Poco Official Announcement

The Poco X7 5G series, including the X7 and X7 Pro models, is set to launch on January 9 in India, with availability through Flipkart. Details about the design and specifications have been revealed prior to the launch.

  • Launch Date: January 9, 2025
  • Models: Poco X7 5G and Poco X7 Pro 5G
  • Purchase Platform: Flipkart
  • Design: Distinct styles with colors like black, yellow, silver, and green
  • Processor: X7 Pro will feature MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra; base model to have Dimensity 7300-Ultra
  • Camera: Expected 50-megapixel main camera; Pro may get Sony IMX882 sensor
  • Display: 6.67-inch AMOLED with high resolution and refresh rate
  • Battery: X7 5G will have 5,110mAh; the Pro variant features a 6,000mAh battery
“With an array of powerful features and striking designs, the Poco X7 5G series is poised to capture attention when it launches early this year.”

In conclusion, the Poco X7 series is highly anticipated due to its innovative features and design, aiming to draw significant interest upon release.

item.title: Flipkart 'Big Bachat Days' sale: Deals and offers on iPhones, Pixels, more - Business Standard
item.description:
Flipkart 'Big Bachat Days' sale: Deals and offers on iPhones, Pixels, more

Date: Jan 01 2025 | Source: Business Standard

E-commerce platform Flipkart is offering significant discounts on various smartphones as part of its "Big Bachat Days" sale from January 1 to January 5.

  • Offers include cashback, UPI discounts, and no-interest EMI options.
  • Apple's iPhone 16 series models available with discounts up to Rs 7000.
  • Google Pixel 9 series smartphones can have bank discounts of up to Rs 10,000.
  • Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 maximizes savings with discounts of Rs 12,500 with select banks.
"Customers can avail a discount of Rs 2000 on UPI transactions for purchasing an iPhone 16 series model."

The sale promises extensive offers across popular smartphone brands, ensuring customers receive excellent value for their purchases.

item.title: Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes, January 1, 2025 edition: Claim your exclusive New Year 2025 freebies now - The Financial Express
item.description:
Garena Free Fire MAX redeem codes, January 1, 2025 edition: Claim your exclusive New Year 2025 freebies now

Publication Date: January 1, 2025

Source: Financial Express

Garena Free Fire MAX has emerged as a popular battle royale game, offering daily redeem codes that enhance gameplay with exclusive rewards. Players must act fast to secure their codes, which are time-sensitive and only valid for 24 hours.

Key Points:

  • Redeem codes provide free in-game rewards like skins and weapons.
  • Each code is valid for only 24 hours and must be claimed quickly.
  • Redeeming codes is simple via the official rewards site.
  • Free Fire MAX competes with other games like PUBG Mobile and BGMI.
“Redeem codes let you level up your gameplay without spending real money.”

The focus on redeem codes highlights the game's evolving landscape and engagement with its community, making it a key feature for players.

Garena Free Fire Max Redeem Codes for January 1: Earn Free Rewards and Exciting Prizes

item.title: Redmi Note 14 Pro+ review: Some hits and a few big misses | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Redmi Note 14 Pro+ Review: Some Hits and a Few Big Misses

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

The Redmi Note 14 series returns with significant updates, striving to build on its legacy in a competitive market with improvements in cameras and performance, yet falls short in software updates.

  • The Redmi Note series is a key product for Xiaomi in India.
  • Redmi Note 14 Pro+ features HyperOS 1 based on Android 14, which will become outdated soon.
  • The smartphone will only receive two major Android updates, which is disappointing for consumers.
“That’s a big disappointment.”

The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ intends to attract a new generation of consumers but has notable software limitations that could affect its longevity.

item.title: Mswipe bets big on international expansion | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Mswipe bets big on international expansion

Publication Date: 31 December 2023

Source: Mint

Mswipe, a payments fintech backed by Alpha Wave Global, is set to expand its operations into regions like the UK, Malaysia, and Nepal to leverage higher margins. This follows a recent successful entry into the UAE and Singapore.

  • Mswipe is focusing on international expansion after a year of marginal revenue growth.
  • The plan includes entering markets such as the UK, Malaysia, and Nepal within the next six months.
  • The company aims to improve its profit margins through this strategic expansion.
“We are targeting high-margin markets to boost our growth,” said co-founder and CEO Ketan Patel.

This expansion reflects Mswipe's efforts to adapt its business strategy and improve financial outcomes amid market fluctuations.
